title: General Settings
description: Configure app behavior and user experience

language.title: Language Settings
language.label: Interface Language
language.hint: Interface will switch immediately after changing language

templates.basicDesc: Can add bookmarks and tags, but cannot delete

browserPermissions.title: Browser Permissions
browserPermissions.description: Configure browser permissions required by TMarks for the best experience

popup.title: Popup Permission
popup.description: Allow TMarks to open popups to use the "Open All Tabs" feature.

howTo.title: How to allow popups?
howTo.step1: On the tab group detail page, click the "Restore All" button
howTo.step2: A popup blocked icon will appear in the browser address bar (usually on the right)
howTo.step3: Click the icon and select "Always allow popups from [site]"
howTo.step4: Refresh the page and click "Restore All" again to use normally

chrome.title: Chrome / Edge
chrome.description: A üö´ icon will appear on the right side of the address bar. Click it and select "Always allow pop-ups and redirects"

firefox.title: Firefox
firefox.description: A popup blocked notification will appear on the left side of the address bar. Click "Options" ‚Üí "Allow pop-ups for [site]"

safari.title: Safari
safari.description: Menu bar: Safari ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Websites ‚Üí Pop-up Windows ‚Üí Find current site ‚Üí Select "Allow"

why.title: üí° Why is popup permission needed?
why.description: The "Open All Tabs" feature needs to open multiple web pages simultaneously. Browsers block batch popups by default for security. After allowing TMarks popup permission, you can open all pages in a tab group at once, greatly improving efficiency.

page.title: API Keys Management
page.description: Manage your API keys for third-party app access
page.info: API Keys are used by third-party apps (like browser extensions) to securely access your TMarks data. You can revoke unused keys anytime.
page.tip1: Each account can create up to {{limit}} API Keys
page.tip2: API Key is only shown once after creation, please save it securely
page.tip3: If a Key is compromised, revoke it immediately
page.revokeMessage: Are you sure you want to revoke this API Key? This action cannot be undone.
page.revokeFailed: Failed to revoke, please try again
page.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this API Key? This action cannot be undone and will clear all usage records.
page.deleteFailed: Failed to delete, please try again

create.title: Create API Key
create.name: Name
create.nameHint: Used to identify the purpose of this Key
create.failedMessage: Failed to create, please try again

success.title: Created! Please save this Key securely

warningList.showOnce: This Key is only shown once and cannot be viewed after closing
warningList.saveNow: Please copy and save it to a secure location immediately
warningList.prefixOnly: You will only see the prefix later: {{prefix}}...

infoBox.usageTip1: API Keys are used by third-party apps (like browser extensions) to securely access your data
infoBox.usageTip2: Each Key can have different permission scopes
infoBox.usageTip3: Recommended to create different Keys for different purposes
infoBox.securityTip1: Do not share your API Key publicly
infoBox.securityTip2: Revoke immediately if a Key is compromised

retention.title: Snapshot Retention Policy
retention.description: Control the number of snapshots retained per bookmark
retention.countHint: Maximum snapshot versions per bookmark (-1 for unlimited)
retention.tip: üí° When snapshot count exceeds the limit, oldest snapshots will be automatically deleted. Set to -1 for unlimited.

maxCount.title: Maximum Snapshots
maxCount.description: Maximum number of snapshots per bookmark
maxCount.hint: When snapshot count exceeds the limit, oldest snapshots will be automatically deleted. Set to -1 for unlimited.

autoCreate.title: Auto-create Snapshots
autoCreate.description: Automatically create webpage snapshot when adding bookmark
autoCreate.enableHint: Automatically save webpage snapshot when adding new bookmark (requires browser extension)

dedup.title: Smart Deduplication
dedup.tip1: Detect duplicate snapshots via content hash
dedup.tip2: Won't create new snapshot if content is identical
dedup.tip3: Save storage space and improve efficiency

autoClean.title: Auto Cleanup
autoClean.daysHint: Automatically delete snapshots older than specified days (0 to disable)
autoClean.warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Auto-cleanup will permanently delete snapshots, please set carefully. Set to 0 to disable.

automation.title: Automation Options
automation.description: Configure auto-create and deduplication for snapshots

infoBox.title: Snapshot Feature Guide
infoBox.tip1: Snapshot feature saves complete webpage content, viewable even if original page is deleted
infoBox.tip2: Enable smart deduplication to avoid duplicate content and save storage space

publicShare.title: Public Share
publicShare.description: Create a public link for others to view your bookmarks
publicShare.enableHint: When enabled, others can access your public bookmarks via link

slug.label: Share Link Suffix
slug.hint: Only letters, numbers, and hyphens allowed. Leave empty to auto-generate

pageTitle.label: Page Title
pageTitle.placeholder: Public page title to introduce to visitors

pageDescription.label: Page Description
pageDescription.placeholder: Optional description to explain the bookmark collection

infoBox.title: Share Feature Guide
infoBox.tip1: Only bookmarks marked as "public" will be shown on the share page
infoBox.tip2: You can modify the share link or disable sharing anytime
infoBox.tip3: Share page can be accessed without login

data.title: Data Management

r2Storage.title: R2 Storage Usage (Global)
r2Storage.description: Total R2 storage used by all snapshots and cover images

importExport.title: Data Import/Export
importExport.description: Import, export, and backup your bookmark data

snapshotManagement.title: Snapshot Management
snapshotManagement.description: Clean up and maintain bookmark snapshot data

exportFeature.title: Export Features
exportFeature.description: Multiple formats to meet different needs

importFeature.title: Import Features
importFeature.description: Import bookmark data from various sources
importFeature.formatTip1: HTML bookmark files exported from browsers
importFeature.processTip1: Support batch processing of large files

data.cleanSnapshotsConfirmMessage:
Are you sure you want to clean all orphan snapshot records?

This will check all snapshot records and delete those whose R2 files no longer exist.

cleanSnapshots.title: Clean Orphan Snapshots
cleanSnapshots.tip1: Check all snapshot records and verify R2 file existence
cleanSnapshots.tip2: Delete database records for non-existent R2 files
cleanSnapshots.tip4: Useful for data repair after manually deleting R2 files

export.tip1: Contains complete data, suitable for backup and migration
export.tip2: Can choose to include tags, metadata, etc.
export.htmlTip2: Can be directly imported to Chrome, Firefox, Edge, etc.
export.htmlTip3: Preserve folder structure and bookmark hierarchy

aiSettings.title: AI Smart Organize
aiSettings.description: Configure AI service for smart tag generation and categorization when importing bookmarks

download.title: Browser Extension Download
download.description: Select your browser to download the corresponding extension
download.tip: üí° 8 browser-specific versions available. You can also use the Chrome universal version (supports all Chrome-based browsers)

permissions.title: Browser Permissions
permissions.description: Configure browser permissions required by TMarks for the best experience

bookmarks.title: Bookmark Access Permission
bookmarks.description: Allow extension to read and save browser bookmarks

tabs.title: Tab Access Permission
tabs.description: Allow extension to access current open tab information

storage.title: Storage Permission
storage.description: Allow extension to store data locally

popup.title: Popup Permission
popup.description: Allow TMarks to open popups to use the "Open All Tabs" feature.
popup.step1: On the tab group detail page, click the "Restore All" button
popup.step2: A popup blocked icon will appear in the browser address bar (usually on the right)
popup.step3: Click the icon and select "Always allow popups"
popup.step4: Refresh the page and click "Restore All" again to use normally
popup.chromeDesc: A üö´ icon will appear on the right side of the address bar. Click it and select "Always allow pop-ups and redirects"
popup.firefoxDesc: A popup blocked notification will appear on the left side of the address bar. Click "Options" ‚Üí "Allow pop-ups"
popup.safariDesc: Menu bar: Safari ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Websites ‚Üí Pop-up Windows ‚Üí Find current site ‚Üí Select "Allow"
popup.whyDesc: The "Open All Tabs" feature needs to open multiple web pages simultaneously. Browsers block batch popups by default for security. After allowing TMarks popup permission, you can open all pages in a tab group at once, greatly improving efficiency.

install.title: Installation Steps
install.description: Follow these steps to install the browser extension
install.step1Desc: Click the download button above to get the extension file for your browser
install.step2Desc: Extract the downloaded zip file to any folder (preferably a permanent location)
install.step3Desc: Chrome: chrome://extensions/ | Edge: edge://extensions/ | Firefox: about:debugging
install.step4Desc: In the extension management page, turn on "Developer mode" switch in the top right
install.step5Desc: Click "Load unpacked" and select the extracted folder
install.step6Desc: Extension icon will appear in browser toolbar, click to use

faq.title: FAQ
faq.iconNotFound: Q: Can't find the extension icon after installation?
faq.iconNotFoundAnswer: A: Click the puzzle icon on the right side of browser toolbar, find TMarks extension and click the pin button to show it in toolbar.
faq.howToGetApiKey: Q: How to get API Key?
faq.howToGetApiKeyAnswer: A: Create a new API Key in the "API" tab of General Settings and copy it to the extension configuration.
faq.supportedBrowsersAnswer: A: Supports Chrome, Edge, Firefox, Brave, Opera, 360, QQ, Sogou and other mainstream browsers.
faq.whereToView: Where to view saved tab groups?
faq.whereToViewAnswer: View and manage all saved tab groups on the "Tab Groups" page of TMarks website.

infoBox.title: Usage Tips
infoBox.tip1: First-time use requires configuring TMarks website URL and API Key in the extension
infoBox.tip2: Recommended to pin the extension icon to toolbar for quick access
infoBox.tip3: Extension automatically saves tab titles, URLs, and favicons
infoBox.tip4: All data automatically syncs to cloud for seamless multi-device access

password.tooShort: New password must be at least 6 characters
password.tip1: Please change your password regularly to protect account security
password.tip2: Password must be at least 6 characters
password.tip3: Recommended to use a combination of letters, numbers, and symbols
password.tip4: Do not share your password with others

search.title: Search Auto-clear
search.description: Set the time for search box to auto-clear after inactivity
search.enableHint: Search box will auto-clear after specified time of inactivity

tag.title: Tag Selection Auto-clear
tag.description: Set the time for tag selection to auto-clear after inactivity
tag.enableHint: Tag selection will auto-clear after specified time of inactivity

infoBox.title: Automation Feature Guide
infoBox.tip1: Auto-clear feature helps you quickly return to initial state, improving efficiency

icon.title: Default Bookmark Icon
icon.description: Choose the default icon when bookmark has no cover image or favicon

view.title: Default View
view.description: Choose the default display mode for bookmark list

density.title: List Density
density.description: Adjust the display density of bookmark list

infoBox.title: Appearance Customization Guide
infoBox.tip1: These settings affect how the bookmark list is displayed, adjust according to your preference

ai.title: AI Service Configuration
ai.description: Configure AI service for smart import, tag suggestions, etc.
ai.enableHint: Enable to use AI smart organization features
ai.modelsFetched: Fetched {{count}} models, select or enter manually
ai.modelsHint: Enter API Key to auto-fetch available models, recommended: {{model}}
ai.apiUrlHint: Leave empty for default URL, or enter custom API endpoint
ai.enterApiKeyFirst: Please enter a complete API Key first

infoBox.title: Usage Guide
infoBox.tip1: API Key is encrypted and stored on server, will not be leaked
infoBox.tip2: AI calls are made directly from browser, data doesn't pass through TMarks server
infoBox.tip3: Recommended: DeepSeek or gpt-4o-mini for best value
